## Field.getSvgRoot() method

Gets the group element for this editable field. Used for measuring the size and for positioning.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSvgRoot(): SVGGElement | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

SVGGElement \| null

The group element.
